item.title: Aug 2018 Work Plan
item.description: I’m writing up monthly ‘work plans’ to plan what work I’m trying to do every month, and do a retrospective after to see how much I got done. I work across a variety of open source projects with ambiguous responsibilities, so work planning isn’t very set. This has proven to be somewhat quite stressful for everyone involved. Let’s see if this helps! JupyterCon JupyterCon is in NYC towards the end of August, and it is going to set the pace for a bunch of stuff.
